messages.content: This is a system message. It denotes (mostly) inarguable rules for the Assistant to follow.
Hello, this is an assistant message. It is an AI generated response to user input.
Messages on this side of the window cannot be edited.
This is a user message. It is a message from the user to the Assistant. You create these! You use these to instruct the Assistant to output the goal as shown below.
This is the goal message. It is the message that the Assistant should output to the user.
